full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Overview

*   **Tender Title:** W0103-249565 - Tailoring Services
*   **Reference Number:** WS4245211914-DOC4313975840

#### Tender Details

*   **Publication Date:** 2023-12-12
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 16, 2024 at 2:00 pm (EST)
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Tender Requirements

*   The successful tenderer shall provide tailoring services to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Trade Agreements

*   **Trade Agreements:** 
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Technical Requirements

*   **Region of Opportunity:** Colombie-Britannique (British Columbia)
*   **Region of Delivery:** Colombie-Britannique (British Columbia)

#### Contract Requirements

*   **Procurement Category:** Service
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Expected Contract Start Date/End Date:** None
*   **Trade Agreements:** see above

#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

*   **Contact Person:** Christine Cress (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** christine.s.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/182610
